listElements.title: Objective of the Game
listElements.context: The goal of the Formula 10 game is for players to predict the 10th-place finisher in every race of the Formula 1 season. Players earn points based on their predictions, and the player with the most points at the end of the season wins the game.

listElements.title: Scoring
list: Each player earns points based on the final race position of their predicted driver, according to the Points Table in the 'Points' section.
Detailed scoring can be found in the Points, Current Standings table.
For sprint races, players must also predict the 5th-place finisher in the sprint race. Scoring for this is based on the Points, Current Standings Sprint Race table.

listElements.title: Prediction Rules
list: Players must submit their predictions before the qualifying session.

If the race weekend includes a sprint race, players must submit both predictions (for the main race 10th-place finisher and the sprint race 5th-place finisher) before the sprint race qualifying session.
Predictions can be modified until the start of the qualifying session.
Players can only submit predictions for the next race after the previous race has ended.

listElements.title: Penalties
list: If a player does not submit a prediction for a race, they will automatically receive the prediction from the previous race and incur a -5 point penalty.
If the selected driver does not participate in the race, the replacement driver will automatically become the new prediction.

listElements.title: Winning the Game
listElements.context: The player with the most points at the end of the season wins the game. Points can be tracked in the Points, Current Standings table.

listElements.title: Additional Rules
list: Registration is required to participate in the game.
In the event of technical issues, the Operator reserves the right to modify or delete predictions.
The Operator may modify the game rules at any time. Players will be notified of changes via email.
